inclusion.criterion: peak aortic jet velocity of >2.5 m/s on Doppler echocardiography
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: grade 2-4 calcification of the aortic valve on echocardiography
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Anticipated or planned aortic valve surgery in the next 6 months,
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Treatment for osteoporosis with bisphosphonates or denosumab.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis and is being evaluated for valvular replacement. He has a history of hypertension, hyperlipidemia, and tobacco abuse.
